description: Make every route a scenic one wearing the Viewfinder Long Sleeve Half-Zip. Built for those days when the air is crisp, this cold-weather collection is easy to layer under all types of outerwear and mid-layers. Made using a merino wool performance blend, Viewfinder expertly wicks moisture away from your skin, keeping you warm, dry and comfortable.
name: Saxx Underwear Viewfinder LS 1/2 Zip - Mens
